str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I enlarge, lengthen, (b) I increase, magnify, extol. From megas; to make great, i.e. Increase or extol.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To dare, endure, be bold, have courage, make up the mind. From tolma; to venture; by implication, to be courageous.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From kolla; to glue, i.e. to stick.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
